item.title: ðŸ“˜ Manual
item.description: Approach With the files, you’d typically look out for several things: File system events/logs/registry (like $MFT for Windows or fseventsd for macOS), which could help build a timeline of when the file was created/deleted/modified.

item.title: ðŸª¦ Backups
item.description: Windows Volume Shadow Copies and Restore \System Volume Information\ Shadow Copies are exactly those pieces of data that get saved on disk when system restore option is enabled.

item.description: Windows Recent documents Key ðŸ”‘: NTUSER.DAT\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Explorer\RecentDocs Contains the list of all recent documents as a bunch and also the same data sorted by extension.

item.title: Office Documents
item.description: File Structure Macros A letter m at the end of extension means that doc has some macros inside.

item.title: PNG
item.description: Structure Malicious PNG It’s possible to craft polygon files that are legitimate PNG and PHP simultaneously.
